artist: Painter: After Adriaen van Ostade; Engraver: Louis Michel Halbou
description: plate 64: rustic interior; peasant seated on a bench with jug and cup in hands; second man in background lighting a pipe at the fireplace; one of two plates printed on a single sheet plate 65: rustic interior with a peasant holding a glass, seated at table with pipe and jug on the table at left
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

in plate in black: 64 / 65/ Ad. Ostade pinxt.   halbou sculp \\ Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain | on sheet in pencil 2-146
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plates 64 and 65
title: Print
